${modID}:WantedPoster.NAME: WANTED Poster
${modID}:WantedPoster.FLAVOR: Even the sickest villain can be found, for the right price.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply a debuff to an ally, they also gain #b1 #yStrength, #b1 #yDexterity, and #b1 #yFocus.

${modID}:ElevenGallonHat.NAME: Eleven Gallon Hat
